Name: PlayerScope
Author: SicakBirTebess√ºm
Description:
Keeps track of players and who a retainer belongs to. Alt characters can also be tracked if they have been seen before.
--Currently only for whitelisted players.
Changelog:
- API 11
- The character detail window now shows how many times the profile has been viewed, how many of those viewers were unique, and the date of the last view.
- Hidden characters now have a lock icon in the 'My Characters & Privacy' tab.
